channel.title: er stress on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in er stress on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaWRKY6 transcriptionally activates CaWRKY40, regulates Ralstonia solanacearum resistance, and confers high-temperature and high-humidity tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CmCNIH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CmoCh07G013500 Gene Symbol: CmCNIH1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucurbita moschata Functional Descriptions: CmCNIH1 improves salt tolerance by influencing the trafficking of CmHKT1|1 in pumpkin.

item.title: GmNAC6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmNAC6 Gene Name: NAC domain protein NAC6 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The NAC domain-containing protein, GmNAC6, is a downstream component of the ER stress- and osmotic stress-induced NRP-mediated cell-death signaling pathway.

item.title: GmNTL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G222300 Gene Symbol: GmNTL1 Gene Name: NAC WITH TRANS-MEMBRANE MOTIF1-LIKE 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNTL1 in soybean (Glycine max) during salt stress promotes its release from the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) membrane and translocation to the nucleus.
